items.title: The AFC North: 1 coach, 2 (?) starting QBs, many questions
items.description: Mike Tomlin, John Harbaugh and Kevin Stefanski are gone, and probably Aaron Rodgers. So what's next?

items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea open to Fernández exit; Madrid, PSG interested
items.description: Chelsea's Enzo Fernández could be available this summer as Real Madrid and PSG monitor his situation. Transfer Talk has the latest.

items.title: What's next for the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks? First look at the NFL's conference title games
items.description: Let's preview the conference championship matchups. How can the Broncos, Patriots, Rams and Seahawks advance to the Super Bowl?

items.title: Transfer window weekly: Güler to Arsenal? Chelsea squad changes?
items.description: The winter transfer window is open, so what are our reporters hearing about deals that could be done?

items.title: Chaotic AFCON final an embarrassment to soccer
items.description: Fan clashes, VAR controversies, missed penalties, a walkout, Senegal's extra time winner - the AFCON final had it all.
